bill.summary:
Drinking Water Funding for the Future Act of 2021
This bill reauthorizes through FY2026 several drinking water programs, such as programs concerning efforts to
assess risks to community water systems, deploy innovative water technologies, enforce compliance with standards under the Safe Drinking Water Act, monitor unregulated drinking water contaminants, assist water systems through the drinking water state revolving fund, protect source waters, test water quality in small and disadvantaged communities, and reduce lead in drinking water.
